page.title: 07LEISURE
page.content: Most people in West Horndon have a reasonable amount of free time. It is generally in the evening and at the weekends. There are 41 different clubs. They come under 7 catorgeries which are,church(The church activites are of 2 groups. One is teaching about christian things and the other is social groups),the scout movement, youth clubs, pre-school, evening classes and adult education, sport,and social activities. Adults do a selection of clubs in West Horndon. Most of their clubs are once a week , fortnightly or monthly The clubs that take place in the morning are coffee mornings and plough mans lunches . The rest take place after 5 o 'clock.The childrens clubs take place in the scout hut ,the village hall and the church.
